HomePage.expectationMessage: Our story wouldn't be the same without you. Come back on February 15th to be a part of it.
HomePage.h1: Time flies when you're preparing something special.
HomePage.h2: The site will be ready in

InvitationPage.h2: On the day that changes our lives forever, we want you to be with us and join us in celebrating our love and union.
InvitationPage.h7: More information coming soon on our website.
InvitationPage.h8: We can't wait to see you!
